names.pinyin: ren dong pu gong er miao san
names.english: caulis lonicera and taraxacum two marvel powder
names.commonEnglish: Caulis Lonicera and Taraxacum Two Marvel Powder

actions: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, dispels Wind-Dampness, soothes the sinews, unblocks the channels, clears Damp-Heat from the Lower Jiao and expels Wind-Heat.
Reduces abscesses, dissipates nodules, clears Heat, resolves Dampness and relieves Fire toxicity.
Strengthens the Spleen, resolves Dampness, expels Wind-Dampness, clears Damp-Heat and relieves pain.
With Che Qian Zi and Hua Shi, for Re (Heat) Lin.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and alleviates pain.
Dispels Wind, eliminates Dampness, harmonizes the Stomach and transforms turbid Dampness.
Promotes urination, drains Heat from the Urinary Bladder, expels Damp-Heat and clears Summerheat.
With Gan Cao, for Summerheat causing painful urinary dysfunction, thirst, irritability and fever.
Harmonizes the Middle Jiao, mildly clears Heat, and detoxifies.
With Pu Gong Ying, for internally or externally for abscesses or other toxic swellings.
Promotes urination and clears Damp-Heat.|
With Cang Zhu, for Damp-Heat vaginal discharge with Spleen Deficiency.
Drains Damp-Heat, especially from the Lower Jiao, relieves toxicity and drains Kidney Fire.
With Che Qian Zi, for burning, painful, hesitant urination.
Strongly dries Dampness, induces sweating, expels Wind-Dampness, tonifies the Spleen, and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
With Huang Bai, for pain, swelling, and weakness of the lower extremities due to Wind-Dampness.
With Yi Yi Ren, for Damp-predominant Bi.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and collaterals, cools the Blood and reduces swellings.
With Ren Dong Teng, for Hot Bi pain with spasms and pain of the extremities.
With Pu Gong Ying, for toxic swellings such as breast abscesses and deep-rooted boils.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain and reduces swelling.
Resolves Dampness
Clears Heat
Disperses Wind
Stops pain
Activates the Blood

symptoms: Severe, acute joint aching and pain
The pain is in a fixed location
The pain is accompanied by redness, swelling and Heat
Heavy sensation in the shoulder and back
Discomfort or a constricted sensation in the area of the chest and diaphragm
Multiple sores, carbuncles furuncles or abscesses
Unbearable swelling and pain of the lower extremities
